<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Replace a call to the specified intrinsic function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If an intrinsic function must be implemented by the code generator</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (such as va&#95;start), this function should print a message and abort.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Otherwise, if an intrinsic function call can be lowered, the code to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// implement it (often a call to a non-intrinsic function) is inserted</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#95;after&#95; the call instruction and the call is deleted. The caller must</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be capable of handling this kind of change.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsiclowering/#a065baf0b078aae98e7c9703d6717e15e">LowerIntrinsicCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Try to replace a call instruction with a call to a bswap intrinsic. Return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// false if the call is not a simple integer bswap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
